text: @spiderspun We're still experimenting right now so we'll see what works best.
@margotlily We're still experimenting with how often we send alerts. Would you want to get more on-topic
@GuardianJoanna Hang in there! We're keeping an eye on what's happening in the world for you.
@reyner We're working on a new avatar. Stay tuned...
We had a problem this morning with some of our DMs being delayed. We're working on the issue. Sorry about that and thanks for your support!
@DavidClinchNews Thanks for trying it out! We're still experimenting and will continue to tune who gets what. Appreciate the feedback.
@paraga Great to hear you're enjoying it!
Hello World! So happy to keep in the know about what's happening in the world. Please send us feedback by replying to the direct messages.
